thread.title: Sarah Marlow

author: Sarah Marlow
title: Sarah Marlow
text:
Having looked around quite a bit online we were beigining to lose sight of what we wanted with so many options....
The staff at Marlow's were lovely and friendly and ever so helpful at finding the perfect diamond. To my surprise they could even set the stone on the premises so we were able to take the ring home that day. A wonderful experience and we shall definitely be returning for the wedding rings
